scripts.setup: npm install -g typescript bower typings browserify watchify http-server
scripts.init: npm run update; npm run start
scripts.update: rm -rf bower_components typings node_modules; npm update; bower update; typings install
scripts.build: npm run clean; tsc    -p ./ ; browserify lib/index.js --standalone duxca -o dist/duxca.lib.js  & http-server -s -p 8000 &
scripts.start: npm run build; tsc -w -p ./ & watchify   lib/index.js --standalone duxca -o dist/duxca.lib.js -v
